aestheticServices.name: Hydra Therapy / Hydra Facial
aestheticServices.description: A deep cleansing, hydrating, and rejuvenating treatment.
aestheticServices.feedback: Loved the glow it gave to my skin!
aestheticServices.details: Includes cleansing, exfoliation, extraction, hydration, and antioxidant protection.

aestheticServices.name: Оху Facial
aestheticServices.details: Oxygen infusion facial therapy that revitalizes skin cells and promotes healing.

aestheticServices.name: Photo Facial
aestheticServices.description: Light-based treatment to improve skin tone and texture.
aestheticServices.details: Uses IPL light therapy to reduce redness, pigmentation, and improve skin clarity.

aestheticServices.name: Carbon Facial
aestheticServices.description: Non-invasive treatment for oily skin, blackheads, enlarged pores.
aestheticServices.feedback: My skin feels refreshed and clean.
aestheticServices.details: Laser carbon peel that exfoliates and deep cleans pores for clearer skin.

aestheticServices.name: Chemical Peels
aestheticServices.description: Exfoliating treatment to remove dead skin and improve texture.
aestheticServices.feedback: My skin feels smooth and bright!
aestheticServices.details: Application of chemical solutions to peel off dead skin layers and enhance renewal.

aestheticServices.name: Derma Abrasion
aestheticServices.description: Mechanical exfoliation to reduce scars and pigmentation.
aestheticServices.details: Uses a rotating device to remove damaged outer skin and encourage new growth.

aestheticServices.name: Permanent Hair Removal
aestheticServices.description: Long-lasting solution to unwanted hair using laser technology.
aestheticServices.details: Laser treatments targeting hair follicles for permanent hair reduction.

aestheticServices.name: Platelet PRP Treatment
aestheticServices.description: Platelet-rich plasma therapy for skin rejuvenation and healing.
aestheticServices.details: Injection of plasma rich in growth factors to stimulate collagen production.

aestheticServices.name: Melasma / Thai Removal
aestheticServices.description: Treatment for pigmentation and discoloration of the skin.
aestheticServices.feedback: My skin tone has evened out.
aestheticServices.details: Laser and topical treatments to reduce melasma and pigmentation spots.

aestheticServices.name: Scar Correction
aestheticServices.description: Procedures aimed at reducing the appearance of scars.
aestheticServices.details: Combination of laser therapy and microneedling to smooth scarred skin.

aestheticServices.name: Vitiligo (Saked Daag) Treatment
aestheticServices.description: Specialized treatment to manage vitiligo skin condition.
aestheticServices.feedback: Treatment has helped improve my skin.
aestheticServices.details: Light therapy and topical treatments to restore pigmentation.

aestheticServices.name: Vampire Facial
aestheticServices.description: PRP facial treatment to stimulate collagen and skin renewal.
aestheticServices.details: Combines microneedling with PRP injections to boost skin healing and glow.

aestheticServices.name: Permanent Tattoo Removal
aestheticServices.description: Laser treatment to remove unwanted tattoos safely.
aestheticServices.details: Q-switched laser technology breaks down tattoo pigments safely.

dentalServices.name: Root Canal Treatment (RCT)
dentalServices.description: Painless and effective solution for infected teeth.
dentalServices.feedback: I was scared, but the treatment was super smooth!
dentalServices.details: Removal of infected pulp and sealing to save natural tooth.

dentalServices.name: MF
dentalServices.description: Maxillofacial treatments for facial injuries and corrections.
dentalServices.details: Surgical procedures for facial trauma, deformities, and reconstruction.

dentalServices.name: Denther
dentalServices.description: General dental care and restorative treatments.
dentalServices.details: Includes fillings, crowns, bridges and other restorative procedures.

dentalServices.name: Crown & Bridge
dentalServices.description: Restorative dental solutions for damaged or missing teeth.
dentalServices.details: Custom-made crowns and bridges to restore function and appearance.

dentalServices.name: Implants
dentalServices.description: Permanent solution for missing teeth with natural look.
dentalServices.feedback: Feels like I have my real teeth back!
dentalServices.details: Titanium implants surgically placed to replace missing teeth permanently.

dentalServices.name: Ortho Treatment
dentalServices.description: Orthodontic treatments to align and straighten teeth.
dentalServices.details: Braces and aligners to correct teeth alignment and bite.

dentalServices.name: Oral Prophylaxis
dentalServices.description: Professional teeth cleaning for oral hygiene maintenance.
dentalServices.details: Scaling and polishing to remove plaque and tartar.
